title: Visual Learning Path for Illustration and 3D Modeling
description: This personalized learning path is designed for individuals with intermediate familiarity in illustration and 3D modeling who prefer visual learning styles.
goals: Enhance skills in illustration and 3D modeling through visual learning techniques.

milestones.title: Understanding Illustration Basics
milestones.description: Learn about fundamental concepts in illustration including shapes, colors, and composition.

resources.title: Color Theory for Artists and Designers

skills_gained: Basic understanding of color theory and composition in illustration

milestones.title: Introduction to 3D Modeling
milestones.description: Explore the basics of 3D modeling, including modeling tools and techniques.
skills_gained: Basic understanding of 3D modeling tools and techniques

milestones.title: Creating Digital Illustrations
milestones.description: Learn how to create digital illustrations using software tools.
skills_gained: Knowledge of digital painting techniques and software tools

milestones.title: Advanced 3D Modeling Techniques
milestones.description: Explore advanced techniques in 3D modeling for more complex projects.

prerequisites: Basic familiarity with illustration and 3D modeling concepts
